statements: DELETE FROM FieldConditions WHERE PHLevel > 7.0 AND WeedDetection = TRUE;
DELETE FROM DeviceData WHERE DeviceID = 1 AND Timestamp < '2021-06-01'
DELETE FROM FieldConditions WHERE WeedDetection = true AND PHLevel > 7.0
DELETE FROM field_conditions WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 50;
DELETE FROM field_conditions WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 60;
DELETE FROM fields WHERE field_name = 'Field 1' AND crop_type = 'Corn';
